rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target card from a graveyard.
{X}{B}, Sacrifice this enchantment: You gain X life and draw X cards. X is the number of card types among cards exiled with this enchantment.
flavor_text: [i]“These people were sick before I even got here. What I do isn't making them worse. This thing I am... maybe there's a way for it to be alright.”[/i]
